A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was a fantastic movie that felt like a real evolution for the franchise.

No longer does it feel like it is standing in the shadow of the original trilogy\, but now stands alone as a great movie for itself.

The pacing was phenomenal\, the references weren't belabored to the point of rolling my eyes\, and I was thoroughly engaged from start to finish.

Definitely recommend!
